pixitItem.feature: Access point SSID to use for tests

SSID of a second valid access point
Credentials for SSID PIXIT.CNET.WIFI_2ND_ACCESSPOINT_SSID
Valid thread OperationalDataset
Second valid thread OperationalDataset
DUT’s supporting Endpoint for the Network Commissioning
DUT’s supporting Endpoint for the Network Commissioning
DUT’s supporting Endpoint for the Network Commissioning
Endpoint supported for Groups cluster is given by the DUT Manufacturer
PIXIT of Duration (in seconds) for a commissioning window which is greater than 179 seconds and less than 901 seconds
This is the maximum time it takes to communicate from the TH to the DUT and back to the TH.
Full motion duration (in seconds) required for the DUT
Predefined list generated from the spec which contains all the mandatory clusters and elements that must be implemented for a given DeviceType

pixitItem.feature: EnableKey for TestEventTrigger Command is provided by the manufacturer
Timeout to use when sending ArmFailSafe command
Regulatory location to use when sending the SetRegulatoryConfig command
Country code to use when setting the regulatory config
PIXIT of the list of SupportedCalendarTypes
The number of incorrect Pin codes or RFID presentment attempts a user is allowed to enter before the lock will enter a lockout state.
The number of seconds that the lock shuts down following wrong code entry.

picsItem.feature: Is DUT Software Component?
Does the device support communication over Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) ?
Does the device support communication over Wi-Fi ?
Does the device support communication over Ethernet ?
Does the device support communication over Thread ?
Does the device support Wi-Fi or Thread interfaces communication ?
Does the device implement a Commissioner ?
Does the device implement a Commissionee ?
Does the device implement a Controller ?
Does the device support the Factory Reset Method?
Does the commissionee device only function within a Matter network?
Is the commissionee device a lock device?
Is the commissionee device a barrier access device?
Does the commissionee device have a vendor specific information element (IE)?
Does the commissionee device or device packaging have a QR code based onboarding payload?
Does the commissionee device or device packaging have a Manual Pairing Code?
Does the commissionee device have a NFC tag containing the onboarding payload?
Does the commissionee device support dynamic passcodes?
Does the DUT support user interface?
Does the DUT support Commissioner Discovery?
Is the DUT a Controller?
Does the commissionee device’s Onboarding Payload contain concatenated QR codes?
Does the commissioner support scanning and processing concatenated QR codes?
Does the commissioner support processing devices in the order as indicated in the concatenated QR codes?
Does the commissioner support indicating to user the need to commission devices one by one for concatenated QR codes?
Does the commissioner support Discovery Capability over BLE?
Does the commissioner support Discovery Capability over IP Network?
Does the commissioner support Discovery Capability over SoftAP?
Does the DUT support Standard Commissioning Flow?
Does the DUT support User-Intent Commissioning Flow?
Does the DUT support Custom Commissioning Flow?
Does the commissioner support accepting a Manual Pairing Code for commissioning?
Does the commissioner support accepting an 11-digit Manual Pairing Code for commissioning?
Does the commissioner support accepting a 21-digit Manual Pairing Code for commissioning?
Is commissionee device subject to physical tampering (doorbell, camera, door lock, designed for outdoor usage)?
Does the commissioner support scanning NFC tags containing the onboarding payload?
Does the commissioner support accepting a QR code for commissioning?
Does the commissioner support scanning QR codes containing the onboarding payload?
Does the commissionee device support Extended Discovery through DNS-SD advertisements when device is not in commissioning mode?
Does the commissionee device support advertising the Vendor ID Commissioning Subtype in Commissionable Node Discovery through DNS-SD advertisements?
Does the commissionee device support advertising the Device Type Commissioning Subtype in Commissionable Node Discovery through DNS-SD advertisements?
Does the commissionee device support TXT Key 'VP' (Vendor ID / Product ID) in it’s DNS-SD TXT Records for Commissionable Node Discovery?
Does the commissionee device support TXT Key 'DT' (Device Type) in it’s DNS-SD TXT Records for Commissionable Node Discovery?
Does the commissionee device support TXT Key 'DN' (Device Name) in it’s DNS-SD TXT Records for Commissionable Node Discovery?
Does the commissionee device support TXT Key 'RI' (Rotating Identifier) in it’s DNS-SD TXT Records for Commissionable Node Discovery?
Does the commissionee device support TXT Key 'PH' (Pairing Hint) in it’s DNS-SD TXT Records for Commissionable Node Discovery?
Does the commissionee device support TXT Key 'PI' (Pairing Instruction) in it’s DNS-SD TXT Records for Commissionable Node Discovery?
Does device support optional subtype _V in commissionable node discovery mDNS?
Does device support optional subtype _T in commissionable node discovery mDNS?
Does device support optional key VP in commissionable node discovery mDNS?
Does device support optional key DT in commissionable node discovery mDNS?
Does device support optional key DN in commissionable node discovery mDNS?
Does device support optional key RI in commissionable node discovery mDNS?
Does device support optional key PH in commissionable node discovery mDNS?
Does device support optional key PI in commissionable node discovery mDNS?
Does device support optional key SII in operational discovery mDNS?
Does device support optional key SII in operational discovery mDNS?
Does device support optional key SII in operational discovery mDNS?
Is the DUT a Controller?
Does device support optional key SII in commissionable node discovery mDNS?
Does device support optional key SAI in commissionable node discovery mDNS?
Does device support Extended Discovery for Commissionable Node Discovery?
Is the device a sleepy end device (SED)?
Does the Controller DUT support Service Advertising?
Does Device support LwIP stack?
Does Commissioner notify user that Commissionee is not a fully trusted device on device attestation failure?
Does commissionee-provided certification declaration make use of dac_origin_vendor_id field?
Does commissionee-provided certification declaration make use of dac_origin_product_id field?
Does commissionee-provided certification declaration make use of authorized_paa_list field?
Does commissionee provide a Firmware Information field in the AttestationResponse?

Is the device a Client

Is the device a Client and supports Reading an individual Event
Does the DUT implement a Bridge
Does the DUT have information on battery level of (at least some of) of its bridged devices
Does the DUT have means to change the state of (at least some of) of its bridged devices, e.g. through a manufacturer-provided app
Does the DUT have means to change the name of (at least some of) of its bridged devices, e.g. through a manufacturer-provided app
Does the DUT support a Bridge
Does the DUT support to maintain a list of connected devices
Does the DUT support to maintain the names of connected devices
Does the DUT support to maintain the state of connected devices
Does the DUT support maintaining information on battery level of connected devices
Does the DUT support the BDX Sender role?
Does the DUT support the BDX Receiver role?
Does the DUT support the BDX Sender role in Synchronous mode?
Does the DUT support the BDX Receiver role in Synchronous mode?
Does the DUT support the BDX Sender role in Asynchronous mode?
Does the DUT support the BDX Receiver role in Asynchronous mode?
Does the DUT control the rate of the BDX transfer ?
Is the DUT an Initiator of the BDX transfer?
Is the DUT a Responder of the BDX transfer?
Does the DUT support sending the BlockQueryWithSkip message?
Does the DUT implement the OTA Requestor Device Type?
Does the DUT implement the OTA Provider Device Type?
Does the DUT support the HTTPS Protocol for OTA image download?
Does the DUT support obtaining user consent for OTA application by virtue of built-in user interface capabilities?
Does the DUT support resumption of a transfer previously aborted?
Does the DUT support Vendor specific OTA implementation?
Does the DUT have Administer privilege over the Access Control of another node?
Does the Requestor DUT support querying a different Provider in its OTA Provider List when it hits error conditions in invoking the QueryImage command?
